txt.en:
Mind you remember what I told you - not everyone's going to have time to talk to you at once! If a hobbit doesn't have a story for you when you want to talk, check back with them later.  

A list of likely hobbits:

Ted Sandyman:
Ted is located on the south side of the Bywater Bridge which can be found following the road south out of Hobbiton-Bywater

Shirrif Robin Smallburrow:
Robin is within the Ivy Bush Inn which is located in the town of Hobbiton-Bywater

Dudo Chubb:
Dudo Chubb is standing near the Tasks Bulletin Board north of the centre of Hobbiton-Bywater

Lobelia Sackville-Baggins:
Lobelia can be found outside of Bag End on the Hill, north of Hobbiton-Bywater and the Party Tree

The Storyteller:
She is located inside of the Ivy Bush Inn, located in the town of Hobbiton-Bywater

Hal Hornblower:
Hal stands near the Hobbiton-Bywater stables, in the south-west corner of the town square

Bogo Chubb:
Bogo is Hobbiton-Bywater's Stable Master and can be found at the stables next to Hal

Lotho Sackville-Baggins:
Lotho is standing outside of Bag End on the Hill, north of Hobbiton-Bywater and the Party Tree

A hobbit child:
The child can be found listening to the Storyteller inside of the Ivy Bush Inn, which is located within Hobbiton-Bywater

Hereward Loamsdown:
Hereward is the barkeep of the Ivy Bush Inn in the town of Hobbiton-Bywater

Holly Hornblower:
Holly's home is directly behind the Ivy Bush Inn, Holly can be found standing outside

Postman Grubb:
The Postman can be found near the mailbox in the north-west corner of Hobbiton-Bywater centre
